about_the_game:
Explore a hand-drawn world of trash with your giant robot, trusty sun-orb, and (lack of) platforming skills!

Gameplay

  • 2D Side-Scrolling Platformer Goodness
  • Jump, Kick, and Catch your way through unnaturally well-crafted terrain
  • Manage your dash/double jump charge through careful planning and execution
  • Traverse a colorful world of trash on its last leg
  • Decide your own path - Levels don't need to be played in a strict order
  • Fill up your base with items collected throughout your journey

This is a game inspired heavily by Mario World Kaizo. Brace yourself.

name: Black Dust Demo
short_description: Explore a hand-drawn world of trash with your giant robot, trusty orb, and (lack of) platforming skills! These hostile lands will test your understand of many bizarre mechanics, and a full exploration can only achieved by the most devoted of players.
